creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: irregular grouping of rocks at bottom center with red tree trunks and two figures seated facing each other on a flat clearing; small fleet of sailboats and a fishing boat in water at center; island with rocky shore, a few huts, and red tree trunks at R; mountains in distance
inscription: URQ: (Wind and moon - who is their master? / By riverside alone I\'ve built my hut. / So what if my plan for life is clumsy? / Even Shun made pottery and fished) (SA)
markings: URQ天心;福田世耕;静処;LLC:村居
title: Wind and Moon Landscape
